sentences.en: a galleon in full sail.
sentences.cn: 一艘全速前进的西班牙大帆船。

sentences.en: a yacht with white sails
sentences.cn: 扬着白帆的游艇

sentences.en: at a speed of eight knots under sail.
sentences.cn: 以八节的航速航行。

sentences.en: Christopher Columbus set sail for the New World in the Santa Maria.
sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗·哥伦布从圣玛丽亚启航前往新大陆。

sentences.en: He loaded his vessel with another cargo and set sail.
sentences.cn: 他给自己的船装上另一批货后便启航了。

sentences.en: He went ashore leaving me to start repairing the torn sail.
sentences.cn: 他上岸去了，留下我修理被撕破的船帆。

sentences.en: I shall sail out on the twenty-second.
sentences.cn: 我将于22日启航。

sentences.en: It would be foolhardy to sail in weather like this.
sentences.cn: 这种天气出航就是瞎冒险。

sentences.en: Roman vessels used to sail with the tide from Boulogne to Richborough.
sentences.cn: 罗马的船只过去经常乘着潮汐从布洛涅航行到里奇伯勒。

sentences.en: She always wanted to sail around the world .
sentences.cn: 她一直想要乘船环游世界。

sentences.en: The men took in sail when the storm approached.
sentences.cn: 水手们在暴风雨来临时落下了船帆.

sentences.en: The repaired sail lasted less than 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 修好的帆支撑了不到24小时。

sentences.en: The ship is under sail, making toward the land.
sentences.cn: 船正朝大陆扬帆航行.

sentences.en: The ship was given the all-clear to sail.
sentences.cn: 这艘船获得了航行许可。

sentences.en: The trawler had sailed from the port of Zeebrugge.
sentences.cn: 那只拖网渔船已经从泽布吕赫港启航。

sentences.en: They were going to sail around the little island, against the tide.
sentences.cn: 他们打算绕着小岛逆潮航行。

sentences.en: Three tall ships sailed past.
sentences.cn: 三艘大船驶了过去。

sentences.en: to sail around the world
sentences.cn: 环球航行

sentences.en: to sail around the world single-handed
sentences.cn: 单人环球航行

sentences.en: to sail into harbour
sentences.cn: 驶入海港

sentences.en: We decided, more or less on a whim, to sail to Morocco.
sentences.cn: 我们多少有点心血来潮，决定航海去摩洛哥。

trans.tran_cn: 航行，起航，驾驶（帆船），飘过
trans.tran_en: to travel on or across an area of water in a boat or ship
